TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but then some guy steals it.

I wish for a pizza.

Granted. The only thing other than the base is melted down crap.

I wish for fame.

granted but you get fame for get in a darwin award

i wish to rule the forum

Granted, but everyone quits due to bad grammar.

I wish for a working computer that doesn\'t break that can run KSP while using a 120 watt electrical supply.

Granted. The computer never starts up.

I wish for glory to shine on my name.

Granted, but said glory breaks the Internet, causing every teenager to freak from not having the Internet. Said freak out causes everyone to destroy everything.

I wish for a feather.

Granted. You catch Avian Flu from it.

I wish for love.

Granted. but it with a horse

i wish to be non dislexic

Granted, but the cheering from the fixed grammar causes the world to implode.

I wish for a duck.

Granted. You get a genetically mutated monstrosity codenamed 'duck' that slowly and agonisingly dies, causing you to get depressed and suicide from watching it.

I wish for God and his angels to bless me. (If anyone is getting these references, say so. Because you are epic if you do.)

granted but they bless you to hell after saying oh god

i wish to live in peceful creative minecraft

Granted, but then you get an out of memory error.

I wish for a shotgun to call things with.

granted but they bless you to hell after saying oh god

i wish to live in peceful creative minecraft

Granted, but you are a block yourself.

I wish that I will pass the RP test.

NEVER NINJA ME.

Granted, but you are instantly banned for cheating.

I wish for nothing, for I can get by and I know so many less lucky than I.

Granted, you live in nothing.

I wish that someone would grant my previous wish.

granted but you break it

i wish to be god

Granted, but Nemesis destroys your only temple.

I wish for a banana split.

Granted, but it makes you fat and you die.

I wish for a papaya.

Granted. It rots.

I wish for 3p1c 1337 5k1llz0rz

Granted, but you are called a n00b.

I wish for RP to open.

Granted, but you are called a n00b.

I wish for RP to open.

Granted, but it will take 52 minutes.

I wish for all wishes including this one to be uncorrupted.

Granted, but you are called a n00b.

I wish for RP to open.

granted but you are banned

i wish i could go back in time so russia won eurovission

Granted, but the time paradox you just caused meant that you died instantly.

I wish for my previous wish to be granted.

Granted, but you have to make a new thread for that or break the OP.

I wish I had a piece of dirt.

Granted, but you have to make a new thread for that or break the OP.

I wish I had a piece of dirt.

granted but it buries you alive

i wish for all the land on kerbin
